fullstack.body:
Dear Hiring Manager,

I am passionate about software development and have experience in both frontend and backend technologies. I am reaching out to explore any potential job opportunities at your esteemed company.

Here are my profiles and projects:

frontend.body:
Dear Hiring Manager,
